learning-code.title: What is blocking from learning code?
learning-code.description: Everyone can learn to code, math skills are not required but depending situation you may need different options.

decided.heading: Haven't you decided yet?
decided.sub_heading: You can try 4Geeks on a free plan
decided.description: We have a free plan for you, with it you can enjoy many of our benefits, including a free feedback session.

faq.label: What payment options do we accept?
faq.answer: At 4Geeks.com, we currently accept payments via credit and debit cards. We strive to make the subscription process convenient for our users, and as such, we support major credit and debit card providers for seamless transactions.

faq.label: Do we offer any free trials or demos?
faq.answer: At 4Geeks.com, we provide a free basic plan that grants access to all functionalities, allowing you to explore and experience our platform. This plan offers a limited version of our services, giving you the opportunity to test our features and resources firsthand. It's an excellent way to get a feel for our offerings before deciding on a plan that best suits your needs.

faq.label: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.answer: Certainly! At 4Geeks.com, with our Plan with Feedback, you have the flexibility to cancel your subscription at any time.

faq.label: What kind of support is available to learners?
faq.answer: You'll have access to one-on-one mentoring sessions conducted by experts in the field. Additionally, our platform offers AI feedback on projects you submit, assistance with exercises, and answers to any questions you might have during your learning journey. This combination of personalized mentoring and AI-driven support ensures that you receive guidance and help whenever needed, enhancing your overall learning experience.

faq.label: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
faq.answer: One-on-one mentoring sessions are 45-minute meetings between you and an expert mentor, where you can ask all the questions related to problems you have on your code, or concepts you don't understand, about almost any technology, and at the day and time that best fits to you.

faq.label: Are the courses self-paced or instructor-led?
faq.answer: Our Basic and With Feedback Plans empower learners to engage with courses at their preferred pace, providing a self-paced learning experience with support from experts or AI when needed. However, if you opt for our bootcamp, the learning sessions are instructor-led.
